articles.title: Making some sense of the new ESPN/MLB.TV streaming partnership and what it means to fans
articles.description:

articles.title: Bruins G Jeremy Swayman set to make Olympic debut and start for Team USA vs. Denmark
articles.description:
Swayman didn't get a start for Team USA in last year's 4 Nations Face-Off, but helped it win the IIHF World Championship later in 2025.

articles.title: ‘We’ll see how it plays out’: Caleb Durbin, Marcelo Mayer each to practice at 2B, 3B to begin spring training

articles.title: Report: Patriots QBs coach Ashton Grant to stay in New England, won’t take OC interviews
articles.description:

articles.description:

articles.title: 10 Celtics stats that should show encouragement and discouragement entering All-Star break
articles.description:

articles.title: Brayan Bello reflects on rough playoff start, enters Red Sox camp with new pitch
articles.description:

articles.title: Boston Legacy FC unveils inaugural home uniform, dubbed the ‘First Light’ kit
articles.description:
The jersey features logos of the team's sponsors, and the hem tag on the bottom — two bears holding up a soccer ball — is a nod to the Franklin Park Zoo.

articles.title: Patriots’ Stefon Diggs pleads not guilty to assault allegation
articles.description:
The arraignment at Dedham District Court was postponed until after Super Bowl LX so Diggs could play in the NFL championship game.

The post Patriots’ Stefon Diggs pleads not guilty to assault allegation appeared first on Boston.com.
